page.description: Returns the Memo file extension that would be associated with the passed in Table extension.
page.original:
TABLE.GET_MEMO_EXTENSION() Syntax Extension as C = .GET_MEMO_EXTENSION( Table_Filename_Extension as C ) ArgumentDescription ExtensionThe filename extension that would be used for the table's memo file. Table_Filename_ExtensionThe three character file type extension associated with any Alpha Anywhere table.
Description The TABLE.GET_MEMO_EXTENSION() method returns the extension of the associated memo file for a particular Alpha Anywhere object type. Example ? table.get_memo_extension(".dbf") -> ".fpt" ? table.get_memo_extension(".ddd") -> ".ddm" ? table.get_memo_extension(".alb") -> ".alm" ? table.get_memo_extension(".set") -> ".sem"
See Also Table Functions and Methods
